rules.allow: read, list: if isSignedIn(); update: if isUser(userId);

create: if isSignedIn() && request.resource.data.from.uid == request.auth.uid; read, update, delete: if isSignedIn() && (resource.data.from.uid == request.auth.uid || resource.data.to.uid == request.auth.uid);
read, create: if isSignedIn() && get(/databases/$(database)/documents/rooms/$(roomId)).data.participants[request.auth.uid] == true; update, delete: if false;
